      • SOCIAL STUDIES
      SOCIAL STUDIES :

      Khan Academy:(https://www.khanacademy.org/humanities/world-history) Offers free video lectures, practice exercises, and quizzes that cover a wide range of social studies topics.

      Subject

      World History


      Read More

      Content

      Free video lectures, practice exercises, and quizzes

      Read More

      Topics Covered

      Different time periods and important civilizations, social institutions, art, and trade

      Read More

      Examples

      The Neolithic Revolution, the rise of empires, and the development of new trading cities

      Read More
